page.title: 04My Day-Paul Sanderson Age 10
page.content: I got up at 7:25. My breakfast was toast and Marmite. I washed and dressed. My Mum drove me one and a half miles to catch the school bus. At 9:00 we had Assembly, then Scripture. Then we made house labels for Sports Day. At 10:20 we did Maths. After 15 minutes play outside we did English. At 11:55 we went by coach to Deeping Leisure Centre for our swimming lesson. At 13:30 we returned and ate our packed lunches. After a short playtime we had music - practicing recorders and songs, to perform to the Senior Citizens. At 15:00 we worked on our Water Project. At 15:30 the bus came. My Mum met me in our Ford Capri car. I watched ITV until tea time. At 18:00 I went for 2 hours swimming training. When I got home I watched TV until 21:45, bed time.
